verses.text: HA‘A ‘Isileli, fanongo ki he folofola ‘a Sihova: tala atu ‘oku ai ‘a e hopo ‘a Sihova mo e nofo he fonua ni, he ‘oku ‘ikai ha mo‘oni, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha meesi, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha ‘ilo ‘o e ‘Otua ‘i he fonua ni.
Ko e takuanoa pē ‘a e Huafa, mo e loi, mo e fakapō, mo e kaiha‘a, mo e tono ‘unoho; ‘oku nau pā atu, pea ‘oku felave ‘a e fakapō mo e fakapō.
Ko ia ‘oku tangilāulau ‘a e fonua, pea ‘oku ngaluvai ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku nofo ai, ‘a e manu ‘o e vao, mo e manupuna ‘o e ‘atā; pea na‘a mo e ika ‘i he tahi ‘oku nau mole.
Ka neongo ia, kae ‘oua ‘e fai ‘e ha taha ha fakapoto, pea ‘oua ‘e fai ‘e ha taha ha valoki; he ko ho kakai ‘oku hangē ko e kau tu‘u ki he taula‘eiki.
Ko ia, te ke humu ‘aho; pea ‘e humu foki mo koe ‘a e palōfita, po‘uli; pea te u faka‘auha ho‘o fa‘ē.

‘Oku faka‘auha hoku kakai ko e masiva poto; he ko koe kuo ke fakatale‘i ‘a e poto, ko ia te u fakatale‘i koe mei ho‘o taula‘eiki kiate au: pea kuo ke fakangalongalo‘i ‘a e lao ‘a ho ‘Otua; te u fakangalongalo‘i ‘e au foki ho‘o fānau.
Ko ‘enau faka‘a‘au leva ke lahi, pea pehē mo ‘enau hia: ko honau lāngilangi te u liliu ko e mā.
‘Oku nau me‘akai ‘aki ‘a e angahala ‘a hoku kakai, pea ‘oku holi ‘a e loto takitaha ke ai ha‘anau faikovi.
Ko ia ‘e hoko tatau pē ki he taula‘eiki mo e kakai; pea te u ‘eke kiate ia hono ngaahi ‘alunga, pea te u fakafoki kiate ia ‘ene ngaahi fai anga.
Pea te nau kai, kae ‘ikai mākona; te nau fe‘auaki, kae ‘ikai te nau mafola: he kuo nau tuku ‘a e tokanga kia Sihova.
Ko e fai fe‘auaki, mo e inu uaine, kae‘uma‘ā ‘a e uaine fo‘ou, ‘oku mole ai ‘a e loto.
‘Oku huhū hoku kakai ki he‘enau potu‘i ‘akau, pea ‘oku tala me‘a ki ai honau va‘akau: he kuo fakahee‘i kinautolu ‘e he laumālie anga fe‘auaki, pea kuo nau fai kovi mei he fatafata ‘o honau ‘Otua.

‘Oku nau feilaulau mei he ngaahi tumutumu‘i mo‘unga, pea ‘oku nau tutu ‘inisēnisi ‘i he ngaahi fo‘i mā‘olunga, ‘i he lalo ‘oke‘oke, mo e popilā, mo e ‘oke; he ‘oku sai tokua honau malumalu: ko ia ‘oku fai fe‘auaki ai ho‘omou fānau fefine, pea ‘oku tonoa ai ‘a e ngaahi uaifi ‘o ho‘omou fānau tangata.

‘E ‘ikai te u ‘eke ki ho‘omou fānau fefine ‘enau fe‘auaki, pe ki he ngaahi uaifi ‘o ho‘omou fānau tangata ‘enau tonoa; he na‘a mo e fa‘ahinga ko ē ‘oku nau afe mo e pa‘umutu, pea ‘oku nau ō mo e kau fefine tapu ki he feilaulau –‘a! ko e kakai ‘oku ‘ikai ‘ilo ‘a e taau kuo pau ke mafuli.

Ka neongo ho‘o fai fe‘auaki, ‘a koe ‘Isileli, kae ‘oua ‘e faihala ‘e Siuta: pea ‘oua te mou omi ki Kilikali, pea ‘oua te mou ‘alu hake ki Pete-‘āveni, pea ‘oua te mou fuakava, “Tangi ‘a e mo‘ui ‘a Sihova.”
He kuo hoko ‘a ‘Isileli ‘o pau‘u, ‘o hangē ha pulu pau‘u: ko e taimi ni ‘e fafanga kinautolu ‘e Sihova hangē ha lami ‘i ha potu fu‘u ‘atā.
Kuo pīkitai ‘a ‘Ifalemi ki he ngaahi ‘aitoli; tuku ai pē ā.
Ko honau uaine lelei kuo kovi; ‘oku nau fe‘auaki fie fe‘auaki: ko si‘i ngaahi pā ‘o e pule‘anga ‘oku nau mātu‘aki ‘ofa ki he mā.
Kuo kofu ‘aki ia ‘e he matangi ‘i hono kapakau; pea ‘e fakamaa‘i kinautolu koe‘uhi ko ‘enau ngaahi feilaulau.
